column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ A Ford Raptor hit a divider
column4: carried on driving on burst tires for around 100 m and then crashed off the road. The driver fled. The incident occurred at 11:50 pm
column7: along R5 in Sras Chak commune
column9: which had no license plates was seen driving at high speeds beofre the incident. ------RASMEI
